name: roof-platform
description: Enterprise Roofing Contractor Scheduling & Management Platform

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py test
scripts.migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py migrate
scripts.makemigrations: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.createsuperuser: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py createsuperuser
scripts.shell: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py shell
scripts.dbshell: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py dbshell
scripts.collectstatic: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python manage.py collectstatic
scripts.setup: ./setup-env.sh && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.prod:build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend

author: Roof Platform Team
